item1: Index Financial Statements Preserve Flexibility Balance Sheet. committed maintaining conservative capital structure. goal average through business cycles following financial ratios: 1) debt-to-Adjusted EBITDA ratio around 5.5x, 2) fixed charge coverage greater than three times, 3) floating rate debt less than 20% total outstanding debt. addition, strive maintain well-laddered debt maturity schedule, seek maximize menu available sources capital, while minimizing cost.
item7: Total property level operating expenses Property level operating expenses include costs operate maintain properties portfolio well taxes insurance. Total stabilized utilities expenses decreased approximately $183.3 million compared same period 2023 primarily due lower power pricing certain properties stabilized portfolio, mainly EMEA APAC. Total non-stabilized utilities expenses increased approximately $44.9 million compared same period 2023 primarily due to: increase approximately $75.9 million due higher utility consumption growing portfolio recently completed development sites (with biggest contributions Northern Virginia, Portland, Zurich, Cape Town Johannesburg); markets biggest contributions Northern Virginia, Portland, Frankfurt, London Paris); decrease power agreement credits $28.7 million; offset decrease $59.7 million related properties sold contributed 2023 2024. cost electric power comprises significant component operating expenses.
